## Mutation Strategy {#mutation}

### Possible Planting Formations {#planting}

The Liechi berry can be acquired by having 23 Passho Berries in your farm.
Pokémon #382 [[Pokémon/Kyogre]] must be caught to unlock this berry. You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Liechi Berries. Purple squares indicate where mutations can occur.

:::collapsed Liechi Mutation - Farm Simulator Code
Copy & paste the line below into the [[Farm Simulator]]'s Import from Text.

``
:::
::: table-mutations
| :----: | :----: | :----: | :----: | :----: |
| [[File:Passho.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Passho]] | [[File:Passho.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Passho]] | [[File:Passho.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Passho]] | [[File:Passho.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Passho]] | [[File:Passho.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Passho]] | |
| [[File:Passho.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Passho]] | [[File:Passho.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Passho]] | [[File:Passho.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Passho]] | [[File:Passho.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Passho]] | [[File:Passho.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Passho]] | |
| [[File:Passho.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Passho]] | [[File:Passho.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Passho]] | {.mutation} | {.mutation} | [[File:Passho.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Passho]] | |
| [[File:Passho.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Passho]] | [[File:Passho.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Passho]] | [[File:Passho.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Passho]] | [[File:Passho.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Passho]] | [[File:Passho.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Passho]] | |
| [[File:Passho.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Passho]] | [[File:Passho.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Passho]] | [[File:Passho.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Passho]] | [[File:Passho.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Passho]] | [[File:Passho.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Passho]] | |
:::

#### Mutations
Liechi Berries can be used to mutate the following Berries.

| Used In                                       | Other Requirements |
| :---:                                         | :---: |
| [[File:Kee.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Kee]]  | [[File:Ganlon.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Ganlon]] |
